author: valsdav
body:
### PR description

This PR moves the tensorflow sessions for model evaluation in RecoTracker/DeepCoreSeedGenerator to the global cache, following the pattern of with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40161 recently integrated. The resulting, planned changes are documented in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/40248.

### PR validation

The changes to the plugin are minor, and tests of the general, new functionality were already part of the PR mentioned above.

@clacaputo @yongbinfeng @riga
title: Moved DeepCoreSeedGenerator TF session to global cache
